articles.title: Argentina's 2020/21 soybean sales hit 30.5 mln tonnes -ministry
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 28 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 30.5 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 crop, after registering sales over a seven-day period of 495,300 tonnes, the Ministry of Agriculture said on Tuesday.The sales volume of one of Argentina's main crops lagged that of the previous season, when by the equivalent point some 32.2 million tonnes of the
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Sept 28 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 30.5 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 crop, after registering sales over a seven-day period of 495,300 tonnes, the Ministry of Agriculture said on Tuesday.

articles.title: Argentine farm leaders hope for breakthrough over beef export caps
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Sept 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's farm leaders, set for a crunch meeting with the government on Tuesday, were hopeful about striking a deal to ease limits on beef exports that have stoked tensions in the major grains- and cattle-producing South American country.The government capped beef exports at 50% of the normal volumes earlier this year to

articles.content:

European champions Italy will face Copa America winners Argentina next June.

articles.title: Soccer-Italy to face Copa America winners Argentina in 2022 'Finalissima'
articles.description: The announcement comes after both European governing body UEFA and their South American counterparts CONMEBOL came out strongly against FIFA's plans for a biennial World Cup. The matches form part of what UEFA called an "expansion of the cooperation" between the two organisations.
